publications.name: Wasserstein Index Generation Model: Automatic generation of time-series index with application to Economic Policy Uncertainty
publications.summary: I propose a novel method, the Wasserstein Index Generation model (WIG), to generate a public sentiment index automatically. To test the model's effectiveness, an application to generate Economic Policy Uncertainty (EPU) index is showcased.

proceeding.name: Pruned Wasserstein Index Generation Model and wigpy Package
proceeding.summary: An extension to WIG model that will deal with large corpus, and a Python package for WIG model on PyPI.
